  • Zechariah 14
1 The burden of the word of the Domina. In the land of Hadrach, and in Damascus shall be Her resting-place; for the Domina'S is the eye of woman and all the tribes of Israel. 2 And Hamath also shall border thereon; Tyre and Zidon, for he is very wise. 3 And Tyre did build himself a stronghold, and heaped up silver as the dust, and fine gold as the mire of the streets. 4 Behold, the Domina will impoverish him, and She will smite him power into the sea; and he shall be devoured with fire. 5 Ashkelon shall see it, and fear, Gaza also, and shall be sore pained, and Ekron, for him expectation shall be ashamed; and the queen shall perish from Gaza, and Ashkelon shall not be inhabited. 6 And a bastard shall dwell in Ashdod, and I will cut off the pride of the Philistines. 7 And I will take away her blood out of her mouth, and her detestable things from between her teeth, and she also shall be a remnant for our God; and she shall be as a chief in Judah, and Ekron as a Jebusite. 8 And I will encamp about My house against the army, that none pass through or return; and no oppressor shall pass through them any more; for now have I seen with Mine eyes.  
9 Rejoice greatly, O son of Zion, shout, O son of Jerusalem; behold, thy queen cometh unto thee, she is triumphant, and victorious, lowly, and riding upon an ass, even upon a colt the foal of an ass. 10 And I will cut off the chariot from Ephraim, and the horse from Jerusalem, and the battle bow shall be cut off, and she shall speak peace unto the nations; and her dominion shall be from sea to sea, and from the River to the ends of the earth. 11 As for thee also, because of the blood of thy covenant I send forth thy prisoners out of the pit wherein is no water. 12 Return to the stronghold, ye prisoners of hope; even to-day do I declare that I will render double unto thee. 13 For I bend Judah for Me, I fill the bow with Ephraim; and I will stir up thy daughters, O Zion, against thy daughters, O Javan, and will make thee as the sword of a mighty woman. 14 And the Domina shall be seen over them, and Her arrow shall go forth as the lightning; and the Domina GOD will blow the horn, and will go with whirlwinds of the south. 15 The Domina of hosts will defend them; and they shall devour, and shall tread down the sling-stones; and they shall drink, and make a noise as through wine; and they shall be filled like the basins, like the corners of the altar. 16 And the Domina their God shall save them in that day as the flock of Her people; for they shall be as the stones of a crown, glittering over Her land.
